meanings.definition: A style of painting with vivid colors and bold brushwork.
meanings.sent1: The artist's fauvism stood out with its bright hues and strong strokes.
meanings.sent2: Her fauvism brought life to the canvas with its vibrant shades.
meanings.sent3: The fauvism in the painting made the flowers look like they were dancing.
meanings.sent4: The fauvism of the artwork screamed with passion and energy.
meanings.sent5: The fauvism in his paintings was like a rainbow exploding on the canvas.

meanings.definition: The use of intense color in a work of art.
meanings.sent1: The fauvism of the piece made it impossible to look away.
meanings.sent2: The artist's fauvism added depth and emotion to the painting.
meanings.sent3: The fauvism in the artwork made the room feel warmer.
meanings.sent4: Her fauvism was like a burst of sunlight in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The fauvism in his art was like a symphony of colors playing harmoniously.

meanings.definition: A movement in art characterized by the use of bright colors and simplified forms.
meanings.sent1: The fauvism of the era brought a new wave of creativity.
meanings.sent2: Artists embraced fauvism as a rebellion against traditional norms.
meanings.sent3: The fauvism in the gallery made visitors feel alive and inspired.
meanings.sent4: Her fauvism was a breath of fresh air in the art world.
meanings.sent5: The fauvism of the period was like a revolution of color and shape.
